revised_title: Relative Velocities of α-Particles from Radon, Radium A, and Radium C
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the relative velocities of α-particles from radon, radium A, and radium C using a more advanced apparatus. They found that the velocities of the radon and radium A groups were somewhat higher than in previous experiments. The results provide a better understanding of the behavior of α-particles and their potential applications in nuclear physics.
